name: JB2A_DnD5e
title: JB2A - Jules&Ben's Animated Assets
description:
A Library of animated spell templates and tokens for DnD5e.
The module is system agnostic but we have defined the spells names, styles* and sizes from the DnD5e ruleset.
* : Exceptions made for very large area of effect.
author: Gazkhan#8192 and Wassily#8035
